    • Method Detail

      • resolveRef

        public void resolveRef(Preface myPreface)
        Resolve message references. Do this after construct-time so that order of messages in file won't matter.
        Parameters:
        myPreface - preface object on which the resolve is performed.

      • setHrefs

        public void setHrefs(java.lang.String servletPath,
            java.lang.String imgRootPath)
        Sets the HTML header and footer of the email.
        Parameters:
        servletPath - Servlet path to be set.
        imgRootPath - image root path for Email

      • composeTextBody

        public java.lang.String composeTextBody(java.lang.String salutation,
                               java.lang.String lastname,
                               java.lang.String ssid,
                               java.lang.String msgIndex)
        Composes the body of email in text format.
        Parameters:
        salutation - Salutation to address the invitee to whom email has to be sent.
        lastname - Last name of the invitee.
        ssid - Studyspace id for generation of the URL.
        msgIndex - Id to identify the invitee.
        Returns:
        String Body of the email in text format.

      • buildInviteUrl

        public static java.lang.String buildInviteUrl(java.lang.String servletPath,
                              java.lang.String msgIndex,
                              java.lang.String studySpaceId,
                              java.lang.String surveyId)
        The URL for anonymous user to use.
        Parameters:
        servletPath - Root path of the URL being generated.
        msgIndex - Index to identify a particular user.
        studySpaceId - Study space id for which link has to be generated.
        surveyId - Survey in the study space for which URL is generated.
        Returns:
        String URL for accessing the survey by anonymous users.

      • composeHtmlBody

        public java.lang.String composeHtmlBody(java.lang.String salutation,
                               java.lang.String lastname,
                               java.lang.String ssid,
                               java.lang.String msgIndex)
        Composes the body of email in text format.
        Parameters:
        salutation - Salutation to address the invitee to whom email has to be sent.
        lastname - Last name of the invitee.
        ssid - Studyspace id for generation of the URL.
        msgIndex - Id to identify the invitee.
        Returns:
        String Body of the email in text format.
